text: Kotero tidalanga aliyense chifukwa cha machimo ake. Pakati pa iwo padali iwo amene tidawatumizira mvula yamkuntho, ndipo pakati pawo padali iwo amene adavutika ndi mphenzi, ndipo pakati pawo padalinso iwo amene adamezedwa ndi nthaka ndipo padalinso iwo amene tidawamiza ndipo Mulungu sadalakwe ayi koma iwo ndiwo amene adalakwira mizimu yawo
